live_updates: Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.
Hydro continues to work to restore power. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
